sentences.english: Liu Guoxi was named as a drug kingpin in the Far Eastern Economic Review during the mid 90's.
sentences.chinese: 90年代中期，刘国玺曾被远东经济评论认定为毒枭。

sentences.english: They are, in order, the Great Seal of the United States, the signing of the Declaration of IndependenceHall and the Lincoln Memorial.
sentences.chinese: 他们是，美国国玺，独立宣言的标记和林肯博物馆。

sentences.english: The great seal is affixed to proclamations .

definition: official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
golden seal/characters tattooed on a convict's face
to become Emperor by the grace of Heaven/to "receive the Mandate of Heaven" (traditional English translation)

tiger tally (a two-piece object made in the shape of a tiger, used in ancient China as proof of authority. One half of a tally could be issued to a military officer and this would be matched with the other half when verification was required.)
credentials (of a diplomat)/documents exchanged between nations/national or dynastic history book
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
